surah_info.description:
Name
This Surah takes its name from v. 80.
Period of Revelation
It is clear from its topics and style that the period of its revelation is about the same as that of Surah Ibrahim, for two things are quite prominent in its background. First, it appears from the repeated warnings in this Surah that in spite of the fact that the Holy Prophet had been propagating the Message for many years, his people in general had not shown any inclination towards its acceptance nay, they had become more and more obdurate and stubborn in their antagonism, enmity and ridicule with the passage of time. Secondly, by that time the Holy Prophet had begun to feel a little tired of making strenuous efforts to eradicate disbelief and opposition of his people. That is why Allah has consoled and comforted him over and over again by way of encouragement.
Topics and the Central Theme
Though the main topics of the surah are:


warning to those who rejected his Message, opposed it tooth and nail, and ridiculed him, and


comfort and encouragement to the Holy Prophet,


It does not mean that this Surah does not contain admonition and instructions. As a matter of fact, the Quran never confines itself to mere warning; rebuke and censure, but resorts to precept in every suitable place. Accordingly, this Surah contains brief arguments for Tauhid on the one hand, and admonition in the story of Adam and Satan on the other.

surah_verses.arabic_text: الٓر ۚ تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَقُرْءَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
surah_verses.en_text: Alif-Lãm-Ra. These are the verses of the Book; the clear Quran.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ جَعَلْنَا فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجًا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: Indeed, We have placed constellations in the sky, and adorned it for all to see.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَحَفِظْنَـٰهَا مِن كُلِّ شَيْطَـٰنٍ رَّجِيمٍ
surah_verses.en_text: And We protected it from every accursed devil,

surah_verses.arabic_text: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱسْتَرَقَ ٱلسَّمْعَ فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٌ مُّبِينٌ
surah_verses.en_text: except the one eavesdropping, who is then pursued by a visible flare.<sup foot_note=76828>1</sup>

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَـٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ مَّوْزُونٍ
surah_verses.en_text: As for the earth, We spread it out and placed upon it firm mountains, and caused everything to grow there in perfect balance.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَجَعَلْنَا لَكُمْ فِيهَا مَعَـٰيِشَ وَمَن لَّسْتُمْ لَهُۥ بِرَٰزِقِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: And We made in it means of sustenance for you and others, who you do not provide for.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَإِن مِّن شَىْءٍ إِلَّا عِندَنَا خَزَآئِنُهُۥ وَمَا نُنَزِّلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِقَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
surah_verses.en_text: There is not any means ˹of sustenance˺ whose reserves We do not hold, only bringing it forth in precise measure.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَأَرْسَلْنَا ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ لَوَٰقِحَ فَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَأَسْقَيْنَـٰكُمُوهُ وَمَآ أَنتُمْ لَهُۥ بِخَـٰزِنِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: We send fertilizing winds, and bring down rain from the sky for you to drink. It is not you who hold its reserves.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَنَحْنُ ٱلْوَٰرِثُونَ
surah_verses.en_text: Surely it is We Who give life and cause death. And We are the ˹Eternal˺ Successor.<sup foot_note=76829>1</sup>

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْنَا ٱلْمُسْتَقْدِمِينَ مِنكُمْ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْنَا ٱلْمُسْتَـْٔخِرِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: We certainly know those who have gone before you and those who will come after ˹you˺.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٌ
surah_verses.en_text: Surely your Lord ˹alone˺ will gather them together ˹for judgment˺. He is truly All-Wise, All-Knowing.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن صَلْصَـٰلٍ مِّنْ حَمَإٍ مَّسْنُونٍ
surah_verses.en_text: Indeed, We created man from sounding clay moulded from black mud.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَٱلْجَآنَّ خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن قَبْلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ
surah_verses.en_text: As for the jinn, We created them earlier from smokeless fire.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَإِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَـٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًا مِّن صَلْصَـٰلٍ مِّنْ حَمَإٍ مَّسْنُونٍ
surah_verses.en_text: ˹Remember, O  Prophet˺ when your Lord said to the angels, “I am going to create a human being from sounding clay moulded from black mud.<sup foot_note=76830>1</sup>

surah_verses.arabic_text: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُۥ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِى فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَـٰجِدِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: So when I have fashioned him and had a spirit of My Own ˹creation˺ breathed into him, fall down in prostration to him.”

surah_verses.arabic_text: فَسَجَدَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ
surah_verses.en_text: So the angels prostrated all together—

surah_verses.arabic_text: إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: but not Iblîs,<sup foot_note=76831>1</sup> who refused to prostrate with the others.

surah_verses.arabic_text: قَالَ يَـٰٓإِبْلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: Allah asked, “O Iblîs! What is the matter with you that you did not join others in prostration?”

surah_verses.arabic_text: قَالَ لَمْ أَكُن لِّأَسْجُدَ لِبَشَرٍ خَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن صَلْصَـٰلٍ مِّنْ حَمَإٍ مَّسْنُونٍ
surah_verses.en_text: He replied, “It is not for me to prostrate to a human You created from sounding clay moulded from black mud.”

surah_verses.arabic_text: قَالَ فَٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌ
surah_verses.en_text: Allah commanded, “Then get out of Paradise, for you are truly cursed.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ ٱللَّعْنَةَ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
surah_verses.en_text: And surely upon you is condemnation until the Day of Judgment.”

surah_verses.arabic_text: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
surah_verses.en_text: Satan appealed, “My Lord! Then delay my end until the Day of their resurrection.”

surah_verses.arabic_text: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: Allah said, “You will be delayed

surah_verses.arabic_text: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْوَقْتِ ٱلْمَعْلُومِ
surah_verses.en_text: until the appointed Day.”

surah_verses.arabic_text: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَغْوَيْتَنِى لَأُزَيِّنَنَّ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: Satan responded, “My Lord! For allowing me to stray I will surely tempt them on earth and mislead them all together,

surah_verses.arabic_text: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: except Your chosen servants among them.”

surah_verses.arabic_text: قَالَ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ عَلَىَّ مُسْتَقِيمٌ
surah_verses.en_text: Allah said, “This is the Way, binding on Me:

surah_verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ عِبَادِى لَيْسَ لَكَ عَلَيْهِمْ سُلْطَـٰنٌ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْغَاوِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: you will certainly have no authority over My servants, except the deviant who follow you,

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمَوْعِدُهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: and surely Hell is their destined place, all together.

surah_verses.arabic_text: لَهَا سَبْعَةُ أَبْوَٰبٍ لِّكُلِّ بَابٍ مِّنْهُمْ جُزْءٌ مَّقْسُومٌ
surah_verses.en_text: It has seven gates, to each a group of them is designated.”

surah_verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
surah_verses.en_text: Indeed, the righteous will be amid Gardens and springs.

surah_verses.arabic_text: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَـٰمٍ ءَامِنِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: ˹It will be said to them,˺ “Enter in peace and security.”

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَنَزَعْنَا مَا فِى صُدُورِهِم مِّنْ غِلٍّ إِخْوَٰنًا عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مُّتَقَـٰبِلِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: We will remove whatever bitterness they had in their hearts.<sup foot_note=76832>1</sup> In a friendly manner, they will be on thrones, facing one another.

surah_verses.arabic_text: لَا يَمَسُّهُمْ فِيهَا نَصَبٌ وَمَا هُم مِّنْهَا بِمُخْرَجِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: No fatigue will touch them there, nor will they ever be asked to leave.

surah_verses.arabic_text: ۞ نَبِّئْ عِبَادِىٓ أَنِّىٓ أَنَا ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
surah_verses.en_text: Inform My servants ˹O Prophet˺ that I am truly the All-Forgiving, Most Merciful,

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَأَنَّ عَذَابِى هُوَ ٱلْعَذَابُ ٱلْأَلِيمُ
surah_verses.en_text: and that My torment is indeed the most painful.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ عَن ضَيْفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ
surah_verses.en_text: And inform them ˹O Prophet˺ about Abraham’s guests

surah_verses.arabic_text: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا قَالَ إِنَّا مِنكُمْ وَجِلُونَ
surah_verses.en_text: who entered upon him and greeted ˹him with˺, “Peace!” He ˹later˺ said, “Surely we are afraid of you.”<sup foot_note=76833>1</sup>

surah_verses.arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ لَا تَوْجَلْ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَـٰمٍ عَلِيمٍ
surah_verses.en_text: They reassured ˹him˺, “Do not be afraid! Surely we give you good news of a knowledgeable son.”

surah_verses.arabic_text: قَالَ أَبَشَّرْتُمُونِى عَلَىٰٓ أَن مَّسَّنِىَ ٱلْكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُونَ
surah_verses.en_text: He wondered, “Do you give me good news despite my old age? What unlikely news!”

surah_verses.arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ بَشَّرْنَـٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْقَـٰنِطِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: They responded, “We give you good news in all truth, so do not be one of those who despair.”

surah_verses.arabic_text: قَالَ وَمَن يَقْنَطُ مِن رَّحْمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ
surah_verses.en_text: He exclaimed, “Who would despair of the mercy of their Lord except the misguided?”

surah_verses.arabic_text: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
surah_verses.en_text: He ˹then˺ added, “What is your mission, O  messenger-angels?”

surah_verses.arabic_text: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: They replied, “We have actually been sent to a wicked people.

surah_verses.arabic_text: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: As for the family of Lot, we will certainly deliver them all,

surah_verses.arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرْنَآ ۙ إِنَّهَا لَمِنَ ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: except his wife. We have determined that she will be one of the doomed.”

surah_verses.arabic_text: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ءَالَ لُوطٍ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
surah_verses.en_text: So when the messenger-angels came to the family of Lot,

surah_verses.arabic_text: قَالَ إِنَّكُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ
surah_verses.en_text: he said, “You must be strangers!”

surah_verses.arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ جِئْنَـٰكَ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَمْتَرُونَ
surah_verses.en_text: They responded, “We have come to you with that ˹torment˺ which they have doubted.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَأَتَيْنَـٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَإِنَّا لَصَـٰدِقُونَ
surah_verses.en_text: We come to you with the truth, and we are certainly truthful.

surah_verses.arabic_text: فَأَسْرِ بِأَهْلِكَ بِقِطْعٍ مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱتَّبِعْ أَدْبَـٰرَهُمْ وَلَا يَلْتَفِتْ مِنكُمْ أَحَدٌ وَٱمْضُوا۟ حَيْثُ تُؤْمَرُونَ
surah_verses.en_text: So travel with your family in the dark of night, and follow ˹closely˺ behind them. Do not let any of you look back, and go where you are commanded.”

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَقَضَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْأَمْرَ أَنَّ دَابِرَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَقْطُوعٌ مُّصْبِحِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: We revealed to him this decree: “Those ˹sinners˺ will be uprooted in the morning.”

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَجَآءَ أَهْلُ ٱلْمَدِينَةِ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ
surah_verses.en_text: And there came the men of the city, rejoicing.

surah_verses.arabic_text: قَالَ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيْفِى فَلَا تَفْضَحُونِ
surah_verses.en_text: Lot pleaded, “Indeed, these are my guests, so do not embarrass me.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُخْزُونِ
surah_verses.en_text: Fear Allah and do not humiliate me.”

surah_verses.arabic_text: قَالُوٓا۟ أَوَلَمْ نَنْهَكَ عَنِ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: They responded, “Have we not forbidden you from protecting anyone?”

surah_verses.arabic_text: قَالَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِىٓ إِن كُنتُمْ فَـٰعِلِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: He said, “O my people! Here are my daughters<sup foot_note=76834>1</sup> ˹so marry them˺ if you wish to do so.”

surah_verses.arabic_text: لَعَمْرُكَ إِنَّهُمْ لَفِى سَكْرَتِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
surah_verses.en_text: By your life ˹O Prophet˺,<sup foot_note=76835>1</sup> they certainly wandered blindly, intoxicated ˹by lust˺.

surah_verses.arabic_text: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ مُشْرِقِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: So the ˹mighty˺ blast overtook them at sunrise.

surah_verses.arabic_text: فَجَعَلْنَا عَـٰلِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
surah_verses.en_text: And We turned the cities ˹of Sodom and Gomorrah˺ upside down and rained upon them stones of baked clay.

surah_verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّلْمُتَوَسِّمِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: Surely in this are signs for those who contemplate.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَإِنَّهَا لَبِسَبِيلٍ مُّقِيمٍ
surah_verses.en_text: Their ruins still lie along a known route.

surah_verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: Surely in this is a sign for those who believe.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَإِن كَانَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأَيْكَةِ لَظَـٰلِمِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: And the residents of the Forest were truly wrongdoers,

surah_verses.arabic_text: فَٱنتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ وَإِنَّهُمَا لَبِإِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ
surah_verses.en_text: so We inflicted punishment upon them. The ruins of both nations still lie on a well-known road.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْحِجْرِ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: Indeed, the residents of the Stone Valley also denied the messengers.<sup foot_note=76836>1</sup>

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا فَكَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: We gave them Our signs, but they turned away from them.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَكَانُوا۟ يَنْحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: They carved their homes in the mountains, feeling secure.

surah_verses.arabic_text: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ مُصْبِحِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: But the ˹mighty˺ blast overtook them in the morning,

surah_verses.arabic_text: فَمَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
surah_verses.en_text: and all they achieved was of no help to them.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَـَٔاتِيَةٌ ۖ فَٱصْفَحِ ٱلصَّفْحَ ٱلْجَمِيلَ
surah_verses.en_text: We have not created the heavens and the earth and everything in between except for a purpose. And the Hour is certain to come, so forgive graciously.

surah_verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ ٱلْخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
surah_verses.en_text: Surely your Lord is the Master Creator, All-Knowing.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَـٰكَ سَبْعًا مِّنَ ٱلْمَثَانِى وَٱلْقُرْءَانَ ٱلْعَظِيمَ
surah_verses.en_text: We have certainly granted you the seven often-repeated verses<sup foot_note=76837>1</sup> and the great Quran.

surah_verses.arabic_text: لَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيْنَيْكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًا مِّنْهُمْ وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَٱخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: Do not let your eyes crave the ˹fleeting˺ pleasures We have provided for some of the disbelievers, nor grieve for them. And be gracious to the believers.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَقُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَنَا ٱلنَّذِيرُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
surah_verses.en_text: And say, “I am truly sent with a clear warning”—

surah_verses.arabic_text: كَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَى ٱلْمُقْتَسِمِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: ˹a warning˺ similar to what We sent to those who divided ˹the Scriptures˺,

surah_verses.arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ جَعَلُوا۟ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ عِضِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: who ˹now˺ accept parts of the Quran, rejecting others.

surah_verses.arabic_text: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَسْـَٔلَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: So by your Lord! We will certainly question them all

surah_verses.arabic_text: عَمَّا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
surah_verses.en_text: about what they used to do.

surah_verses.arabic_text: فَٱصْدَعْ بِمَا تُؤْمَرُ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: So proclaim what you have been commanded, and turn away from the polytheists.

surah_verses.arabic_text: إِنَّا كَفَيْنَـٰكَ ٱلْمُسْتَهْزِءِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: Surely We will be sufficient for you against the mockers,

surah_verses.arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجْعَلُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۚ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
surah_verses.en_text: who set up ˹other˺ gods with Allah. They will soon come to know.

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ نَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ يَضِيقُ صَدْرُكَ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ
surah_verses.en_text: We certainly know that your heart is truly distressed by what they say.

surah_verses.arabic_text: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
surah_verses.en_text: So glorify the praises of your Lord and be one of those who ˹always˺ pray,

surah_verses.arabic_text: وَٱعْبُدْ رَبَّكَ حَتَّىٰ يَأْتِيَكَ ٱلْيَقِينُ
surah_verses.en_text: and worship your Lord until the inevitable<sup foot_note=76838>1</sup> comes your way.
